question_content.description:
### Problem08


1.Discribe the following code fragment
```java
String s;
s = new String("Hello, World");
```
- The first line _____(0)\___ a variable s of type _____(1)\___.
- The sencond line _____(2)\___ a constructor to create an _____(3)\___.

Computer Science
Sedgewick, Robert,Wayne, Kevin
